verses.verse: By <S%H3915>night<s%> on my <S%H4904>bed,<s%> I <S%H1245>sought<s%> him whom my <S%H5315>soul<s%> <S%H157>loves.<s%> I <S%H1245>sought<s%> <S%H4672>him,<s%> but I didn't find him.

I will get <S%H6965>up<s%> <S%H5437>now,<s%> and go about the <S%H5892>city;<s%> in the <S%H7784>streets<s%> and in the <S%H7784>squares<s%> I will <S%H1245>seek<s%> him whom my <S%H5315>soul<s%> <S%H157>loves.<s%> I <S%H1245>sought<s%> <S%H4672>him,<s%> but I didn't find him.
The <S%H8104>watchmen<s%> who go <S%H5437>about<s%> the <S%H5892>city<s%> <S%H4672>found<s%> <S%H7200>me;<s%> "Have you seen him whom my <S%H5315>soul<s%> <S%H157>loves?<s%>"

I had <S%H4592>scarcely<s%> <S%H5674>passed<s%> from <S%H4672>them,<s%> when I found him whom my <S%H5315>soul<s%> <S%H157>loves.<s%> I <S%H270>held<s%> <S%H7503>him,<s%> and would not let him go, until I had <S%H935>brought<s%> him into my <S%H517>mother<s%>'s <S%H1004>house,<s%> into the <S%H2315>room<s%> of her who conceived <S%H2029>me.<s%>

I <S%H7650>adjure<s%> <S%H1323>you,<s%> daughters of <S%H3389>Jerusalem,<s%> by the <S%H6643>roes,<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> by the <S%H355>hinds<s%> of the <S%H7704>field,<s%> that you not stir <S%H5782>up,<s%> nor <S%H5782>awaken<s%> <S%H160>love,<s%> until it so <S%H2654>desires.<s%>

Who is this who <S%H5927>comes<s%> up from the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> like <S%H8490>pillars<s%> of <S%H6227>smoke,<s%> <S%H6999>perfumed<s%> with <S%H4753>myrrh<s%> and <S%H3828>frankincense,<s%> with all <S%H81>spices<s%> of the <S%H7402>merchant?<s%>
<S%H8010>Behold,<s%> it is Solomon's <S%H4296>carriage!<s%> <S%H8346>Sixty<s%> <S%H1368>mighty<s%> men are <S%H5439>around<s%> <S%H1368>it,<s%> of the mighty men of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

They all <S%H270>handle<s%> the <S%H2719>sword,<s%> and are <S%H3925>expert<s%> in <S%H4421>war.<s%> Every <S%H376>man<s%> has his <S%H2719>sword<s%> on his <S%H3409>thigh,<s%> because of <S%H6343>fear<s%> in the <S%H3915>night.<s%>

He <S%H6213>made<s%> its <S%H5982>pillars<s%> of <S%H3701>silver,<s%> its <S%H7507>bottom<s%> of <S%H2091>gold,<s%> its <S%H4817>seat<s%> of <S%H713>purple,<s%> its <S%H8432>midst<s%> being <S%H7528>paved<s%> with <S%H160>love,<s%> from the <S%H1323>daughters<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem.<s%>

Go <S%H3318>forth,<s%> you <S%H1323>daughters<s%> of <S%H6726>Zion,<s%> and <S%H7200>see<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H8010>Solomon,<s%> with the <S%H5850>crown<s%> with which his <S%H517>mother<s%> has <S%H5849>crowned<s%> <S%H3117>him,<s%> in the day of his <S%H2861>weddings,<s%> in the <S%H3117>day<s%> of the <S%H8057>gladness<s%> of his <S%H3820>heart.<s%> Lover
